title: New Jersey Devils Stanley Cup 2002-2003 Champions
description: Own the most watched NHL event of the year. Complete with highlights from the regular season, playoffs and the final series. Watch as your team fights for, and eventually hoists the Cup! The 2003 release will contain full coverage of the Champ's winning season, including exclusive interviews, key insights and behind the scenes action.
